EmailTemplate.name: 20March14- Thought Leadership.Invite 3.3
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, tomorrow's thought leadership webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: There's one day left to join us on Thursday, March 20 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "Take Charge of Your Vertical: How to Be a Thought Leader <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/take-charge-your-vertical-how-be-thought-leader>." MBO Partners is welcoming author and CEO of Thought Leadership Lab Denise Brosseau to our webinar series. Denise will walk you through case studies, tips and techniques you can use gain visibility as an industry expert. All attendees of tomorrow's webinar will have a chance to win a copy of her new book "Ready to Be a Thought Leader?" Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/take-charge-your-vertical-how-be-thought-leader>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
